title: Does decay affect Unranked players from S4 MMR?
body:
Hey,

I was just curious if decay affects players who placed above Gold in Season 4 and haven't ranked in Season 5 yet.

Thank you in advance!

replies.body: Pretty sure MMR never decays (even for high ranked players), only your LP/visible rating. If you haven't played ranked this season, you don't have anything that can decay yet
